price: او څوک چې د قران څخه ځان ړوند کړي، يو شيطان به پرې وګومارو نو هغه به يې (تل) ملګرى وي.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡشُ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ نُقَيِّضۡ لَهُۥ شَيۡطَٰنٗا فَهُوَ لَهُۥ قَرِينٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿshu ʿan dhik'ri al-raḥmāni nuqayyiḍ lahu shayṭānan fahuwa lahu qarīnun
